title: Economic policies East and West Europe post 1945

content.question: Directions: The suggested planning and writing time for the question below is 35 minutes. Make sure that you are best prepared to answer the question thoroughly in the time permitted. You should spend 5 minutes organizing or outlining your answer. Write an essay that: Has a relevant thesis. Addresses all parts of the question. Supports thesis with specific evidence. Is well organized. Describe and analyze economic policies in Eastern and Western Europe after 1945.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
